name: mongocmd
description: Running mongo command line tools from node
author: Jakob Mattsson <jakob@leanmachine.se> (http://jakobmattsson.se)

scripts.coverage: jscov --expand src .cov && JSCOV=.cov mocha --timeout 10000  --compilers coffee:coffee-script --reporter mocha-term-cov-reporter tests/*.coffee || exit 0
